column2: Your liege has a direct vassal which is actually your de jure vassal. You may petition [Root.Liege.GetHerHim] for a vassal transfer.

In one fell swoop, you may transfer all of your own de facto vassals whom are actually de jure vassals of §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!, but you cannot transfer any vassals that are currently at war or part of a revolt.
A de jure vassal's de facto liege is my own liege, and we're all at peace
